title: New Android Auto update brings one-tap message replies
content:
We first reported in December that Google was adding the ability to let Android Auto users respond to text messages with one tap using Google Assistant and Smart Reply. description: A new Android Auto update allows for one-tap message replies giving users a safer option when messaging on the road.
